title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, it emits a beep sound. This behavior is unexpected.
OB: When choosing SWT.MULTI, it triggers a beep sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also causes the same beep sound.
EB: When selecting SWT.MULTI, there should be no beep sound.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Launch Build F1 (20020521) on Win2K.
2. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
3. Switch to the Text tab.
4. Select Styles SWT.SINGLE.
5. Switch back to Styles SWT.MULTI.
